contextId.occurrenceNote: This means that the men were from Jericho. Alternate translation: "men from Jericho" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-possession]])
This means that the wall was beside the Pool of Siloam. Alternate translation: "the wall that surrounded the Pool of Siloam" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-possession]])
contextId.glQuote: the wall of the Pool of Siloam
